thread.title: A Christmas Story star Peter Billingsley is engaged
thread.title_full: A Christmas Story star Peter Billingsley is engaged - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: A Christmas Story star Peter Billingsley is engaged
text:
By Liz Raftery, Peter Billingsley , who played Ralphie in the 1983 holiday classic A Christmas Story , is engaged, Us Weekly reports.
Billingsley, 44, will marry his girlfriend, Buffy Bains, a graduate of Southern Methodist University who filmed a promotional video for Chicago Young Republicans in 2010. There's no word on whether the actor will wear a bunny suit to the ceremony.
Billingsley's recent movie credits include Elf , Iron Man and The Break-Up . He also works as a producer and has executive-produced such films as Iron Man and Couples Retreat . In addition, he was an executive producer of A Christmas Story: The Musical! in 2010.
